Description:
Enjoy the Ease of Modern 4 Bedroom Living
How many times have you wanted a modern 4 bedroom home that's a short walk to transport, shops and schools? This smart brick veneer home is set behind a picket fence in a leafy court, and will suit families seeking easy living, or investors. In fact the light-filled interior is styled with contemporary window furnishings and carpets and is ready to enjoy. Four double bedrooms (3 robed) are serviced by a deluxe bathroom. The privately-zoned master bedroom boasts an ensuite with corner spa bath and WIR. Two living areas invite casual living and entertaining. There's a spacious lounge/dining room with bi-fold doors opening to a bright family/meals room. Discover a well-equipped open plan kitchen featuring quality appliances, good storage and leadlight window. A large private L' shaped deck (covered) with bistro blinds and lighting is a superb indoor/outdoor space for relaxing or entertaining. Children have a lovely neat landscaped garden and the handyperson will love the big lock-up shed, which could be a workshop. Extras: gas heating, evaporative cooling, 2 x sheds, under-house storage and carport. Walk to Eastfield Rd shops, bus, Dorset Rd Primary, Croydon Special Development School and Eastfield Park. Handy to EastLink. Don't miss it!
* Photo ID required for all Open Home Inspections
* To view our office profile, please click on Virtual Tour Link.

Description:
COUNTRY CHARM ON ¼ ACRE
With its tall manicured hedges, rambling gardens and abundant birdlife, you’d be forgiven for thinking you’d arrived at a private country estate. With just over ¼ acre of beautiful bush land to explore, and a back gate to Gracedale Park walking track, this charming cottage style home promises serene living close to schools, shops and East Ringwood station. The sand brick home sits at the top of the gently sloping property, with romantic leadlight windows, an open fireplace in the lounge, and a timber verandah perched amid the treetops. The secret garden promises endless adventure and enjoyment with shady native trees, a thriving vegetable patch, enough room for chickens and a 24,000L rainwater tank for self-sufficiency. Brick paved pathways, a solid timber door, Baltic Pine floors, textured carpet, ducted heating and a Fujitsu split system cooler create an inviting setting much like a charming bed and breakfast. Just steps away from Tinternvale Primary, Tintern Anglican Girls Grammar and the pictureseque pathways of The Tarralla Creek Trail, this is the kind of property that feels like a tree change only 30km from the CBD.

Description:
Discover Carefree Living in a Superb Location
If you're seeking stylish, modern living without the upkeep, you must see this gorgeous brick veneer home. In fact the low-maintenance block, spacious layout and prized Tintern location - within walking distance of Ringwood East station, shops and Tintern Girls Grammar will suit Retirees, Investors or First Homebuyers. Privately set behind a high picket fence, you'll love the corner bay windows, front deck and pretty landscaped garden. The light-splashed interior is styled with high quality window furnishings and contemporary carpets. You won't need to compromise on space because there are two large living areas an elegant lounge room with open fireplace for cosy evenings, and a family/meals room. Discover a smart open plan gourmet kitchen fitted with quality appliances and dishwasher. Three bedrooms (BIRs) are serviced by a sparkling walk-thru bathroom and powder room. Plus, laundry with built-in storage. The trendy paved and landscaped garden is all about easy-care enjoyment it features river pebbles, pergola and barbeque area. Appointments: ducted heating, air-conditioning and remote lock-up garage. Walk to station, Eastfield Rd shops, Tinternvale Primary and Cheong Park reserve. Act now!

Description:
Light, Bright and a Delight
If you have dreamed of a picket fence life, this one may be the home for you. Nestled in a quiet street, this delightful, well-presented home is perfectly located for busy couples and young families, close to reserves, shops, schools and transport. Accentuated by down lights and gleaming polished boards throughout, the home is filled with character and provides the perfect life for those who are looking for a low-maintenance property rather than wasting weekends with endless to-do lists. Winter or summer, you won't be affected by the elements here with gas heating and air-conditioning to keep you comfortable all year round. The spacious lounge is the perfect place to watch the football or latest flick and for meal preparation, the functional kitchen/meals area will serve your family well or even better, sit out on the back deck and enjoy a glass of your favourite to unwind after a hard day's work. The roomy, robed master delivers summer relief complete with ceiling fan, while the other two bedrooms are also sizable; bedroom two is robed as well.
Other inclusions to make this home the ideal investment list as; large linen press, secure yard with new fencing, covered front porch, garden shed, paved drive and pathways, single carport and additional parking.
With only two on the block (separate titles), this neat and tidy home is the perfect entry into the market for first-home buyers or investors looking to buy one, or possibly both properties to add to their portfolio. Make a move today!

Description:
A GREAT START IN A PERFECT POSITION
Whether you are a first home buyer, looking to upsize from a unit, or an astute investor, comfortable living starts with this family friendly home in a family friendly neighbourhood. Complementing a refined formal living room, the heart of the house is a generously proportioned casual living area. With easy care timber floors, it opens at one end to a decked, heated inground spa, and
to a covered paved area at the other to provide exceptional year round indoor outdoor living and entertainment. The main bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe is complemented by two further bedrooms, ensuring space for the whole family. Moments from a number of schools, local shops and Woodland Park it offers the welcome bonus of two oversize double garages making it ideal for collectors, boating enthusiasts or those with a home based business.

Address: 3 Briar Rose Walk CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136
Description:
Impressive Home, Tradie's Paradise!
This immaculate three bedroom home is situated in a serene estate of tree-lined streets and park lands, making this the ideal location to raise a family in blissfully quiet and harmonious surrounds. If you think the bay windows and landscaping work well together to create an impressive facade, you'll simply love the finishing touches waiting inside. The arresting master bedroom comprises built-in-robes with a stylish en-suite effect, whilst the other bedrooms are also serviced by built-in-robes with easy access to the bathroom also. The orange glow bounces off the lounge room walls when the Coonara is roaring, warming the entire home even through to the kitchen, which features abundant cupboard space, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and overlooks the meals area which opens out to a covered patio for outdoor entertaining. Outside is just as thoughtfully designed with all the little details taken care of. The laundry enjoys easy access to the clothesline and the large backyard provides the perfect place for a swing set and trampoline. Tradies will appreciate the double carport with pitched roof, four-car garage (fully lined and insulated) and the expansive drive providing an array of off-street parking - above and beyond the norm.
Other inclusions are; ducted heating, carpet, tiled wet areas, ceiling fans, split system air-conditioning, water tank (3000 ltr), awnings and front fence for added security.
If you're looking for a well-presented home with nothing else to do but relax, this is definitely the one you've been waiting for.
Maree Slade : 0419 519 282

Description:
Where The Living Is Easy
Offering a hassle-free lifestyle, this brick home is ideally proportioned for low-maintenance living. Complete with floorboards and tiling throughout and fronted by a tidy front yard, this home delivers on simplicity and comfort, perfect for 1st home buyers or investors.
A well-proportioned living area greets visitors and looks out onto the patio and front yard, with back courtyard views provided from the kitchen. Appointed with ample cupboard and bench space which extends to create a breakfast bar, the kitchen and meals area provides a variety of options for storage and dining. The bedrooms offer built in robes while the generous bathroom provides a large modern vanity.
Located moments from parkland, Eastfield and Merrindale Shops, Eastland and EastLink, the property provides ease of living on a variety of levels.
Additional features:
Split system air conditioner
Security system

Description:
CORNER BLOCK
Set in a great location on a corner allotment of 970sqm, this colonial style brick home is located in a very quiet and peaceful position in a beautiful tree lined street just moments from Eastfield shopping centre, Tintern Secondary College and Tintern Primary schools.
The large block has room to develop (S.T.C.A), the home features 3 bedrooms, the master has build in robes with large windows allowing in natural light. The living area opens outside with double doors, timber kitchen with lots of cupboard space and an updated bathroom.
Additional features include double garage with room for further car parking in front, separate laundry with direct external access, gas ducted heating plus open fire place for extra warmth and polished hardwood floors.
Ken Bradbury : 0411 808 950

Description:
A Land of Possibility. Build Your Dream Home or Subdivide
Benefiting from a wide street frontage and land size of 911m2 (approx) and offering view of the Dandenong Ranges, this humble home provides plenty of exciting prospects! Demolish the existing home and build your dream home or renovate the current residence and build a new unit at the back creating a totally new dual-occupancy site (STCA).
Perfectly rentable, there'll be time to sit back and work out the best way to maximize this lands potential. Beautifully positioned on a pretty street surrounded by truly delightful family homes in the Tintern belt, the home boasts a bright lounge room with air conditioning, a functional kitchen overlooking the rear yard, three good-sized bedrooms, a double carport, gas ducted heating and close proximity to public and private schools, transport, shops, parks and reserves.
By the way, the property next door on 876m2 (approx) is up for grabs too; imagine what you could do with both? Inspect today!
Ben Chrimes : 0438 285 337

Description:
When Three's Company
(Bayswater North.) A tasteful blend of old world charm combined with today's modern luxuries. This circa 1930's cottage has undergone an extensive ground-up renovation, yet still retains many decorative ornate features seldom found in homes of today. Two substantial bedrooms, large open plan living, hostess kitchen including stainless steel appliances and central island bench looking onto adjacent meals. Trendy updated bathroom, separate WC and laundry. Outside, there is a huge double garage and generous fully-fenced child and pet friendly rear garden/patio area, perfect for those who still want a backyard. There's definitely nothing small about this house except for the price. Inspect today.
Greg Wittmann : 0409 560 122

Description:
This Is It!
A sanctuary of style and comfort, this fabulous find lies within walking distance of Eastfield shops, schools and parkland. Updated interiors – enhanced by hardwood floors, neutral tones, corniced ceilings and abundant natural light, make this home a warm environment. Providing for formal and informal living requirements, a large lounge flows to the modern kitchen and adjacent meals area. Sure to impress the entertainer, a stunning covered deck provides ample room for soirees and season -round alfresco living.
Affording each family member the privacy they require, the sleeping quarters comprises bedrooms of comfortable proportions serviced by an immaculate bathroom (spacious master with a wall of mirrored robes).
Features include: gas ducted heating, an air-conditioning unit and a double garage.

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
You will be the envy of your friends with this stylish 3 year old family home tucked in a peaceful pocket of Croydon South. Offering a comfortable lifestyle of space and quality, ideally located within walking distance to a choice of local schools, parklands and shops, accommodation comprises 3 carpeted bedrooms (main with walk-in robe, luxury ensuite and private courtyard), study, vast open-plan kitchen/meals/family zone, separate lounge, central family bathroom, and laundry. The kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, Caesar Stone benchtops, and huge island bench with pendant lights - plenty to inspire the family Masterchef! The adjoining covered alfresco deck is the ideal place for entertaining family and friends, and overlooks the neat low-maintenance garden. A separate courtyard nook offers a quiet haven for morning coffee. Features include electric ducted heating and refrigerative cooling, quality blinds, instant hot water, laminate timber floating floor, garden shed, water tank, and remote double garage with generous proportions all around. There's nothing to do here but relax and enjoy your sparkling near-new home - inspect today!

Description:
Renovated House, Great Land, Huge Offer!
This delightful corner block and lovely home sits in a quiet little pocket, close to schools, parks, reserves, transport and shops. With distant, but picturesque views of the Dandenongs, an attractive, rendered and renovated dwelling sits on an impressive 930m2 (approx) of near level land. A sunny lounge room provides a pretty outlook to the large front yard, and then steps through to a fresh new kitchen with leadlight cupboard doors, stainless steel appliances, big pantry, plus a Euro style cupboard that hides the laundry! Bi-fold doors open seamlessly to an expansive rear deck, boasting heaps of space for outdoor entertaining and superb summer living. The rear yard, fully fenced and secure, is big enough to kick the footy and play cricket, plant a big veggie patch, or perhaps provide the land to extend the current house (STCA). A modern, smart new bathroom services three good sized and light-filled bedrooms, with the master featuring great robes and a beautiful scenic outlook. Benefiting from polished timber floors, new carpet, gas ducted heating, ducted refrigerated air-conditioning, a garden shed and double carport, this home offers practical living within a truly classy and peaceful setting. Providing the opportunity to enjoy this home as is, or perhaps extend the current floorplan, the land size also allows for the prospect of dual occupancy (STCA). So first home buyers, families and investors, step right up, you'll be super impressed with this package and all it has to offer!
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
SOLD AT AUCTION ON SAT 17th SEPT
Family-Treasured...
In the one family since its formation, this warm home on an impressive 2411SQM (approx) has been tightly-held for good reason! A pleasant facade makes way for spacious interiors offset by vaulted ceilings and subtle tones which merge with abundant natural light to create atmospheric openness. Complemented by a brick feature wall and an open fireplace, the L-shaped dining and lounge room provides for more formal entertaining. At the heart of the home, a well-appointed kitchen (with stainless-steel appliances and a breakfast bench) oversees the casual meals and family area. Positioned for privacy, the master bedroom is equipped with a walk-in robe and ensuite. Zoned together, the remaining bedrooms (with built-in robes and the service of an immaculate bathroom) lie alongside a retreat space which may serve as a fourth bedroom. Sliding doors access a covered pergola with a built-in bar. Incredibly inviting, a beautiful azure in-deck pool caters for alfresco recreation. The incredible size of the backyard is an outstanding feature in itself. Also occupying the vast space is a garden/storage shed and a cubby house. Tradesmen will appreciate the large side gate. Adding to the family-friendly appeal, the home is within walking distance to parkland, Tinternvale Primary School and close to a range of secondary schools, kindergartens, local shops and transport. Features include: split-system air-conditioning and a gas heater.
Insights: 6 Camelia Court, Croydon South VIC 3136 was last sold in 2011 and 17 other 4 bedroom house in Croydon South have recently been sold.

Description:
Attention All First Homebuyers and Investors!
Attention all first homebuyers and investors, this reasonably priced weatherboard home is set within close proximity to shops, transport, schools, parks, reserves and medical facilities. Featuring delightful windows and polished timber floors throughout, this family sized home comprises a charming large entrance and spacious lounge room with an open fire place and an abundance of natural light. A large, functional kitchen also caters as a casual meals area and boasts views to the rear yard. Three good sized bedrooms, all with robes are serviced by a neat and tidy bathroom and substantial laundry.
Benefiting from a completely private, fully fenced, low maintenance but roomy yard, there's plenty of space for the kids to run and play. There's also a covered entertaining area to be enjoyed, providing room for the BBQ and outdoor setting.
Comprehensively equipped with gas ducted heating, double carport and garden shed, this property is ready for comfortable living and allows scope for updating at your leisure. Inspect now.
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
HUGE FAMILY HOME THAT WONT DISSAPOINT
Presenting a brilliant home which offers family flexibility at its best, with three living areas and 5 bedrooms, this spacious home also has 2 bathrooms with master bedroom boasting an en-suite and walk in wardrobe. The family rumpus centres around the gas Coonara heater and adjoins the open plan kitchen with meals area. All your outdoor living options are catered for with the large covered patio and impressive in-ground pool. Positioned on a large allotment and including a double carport with drive-thru access to a 7m x 7m garage.

Description:
Where Parkland Abounds
Enjoying a quiet yet well-established and central location, this beautifully presented clinker brick home has undergone an extensive renovation. The charming facade and white picket fence together with the recently updated garden add to the property's street appeal, while the polished timber floors and freshly painted walls make for a warm and inviting interior.
Inside the front door, a light-filled formal lounge with open fireplace leads through to the modern kitchen and spacious family room beyond. From here a wonderful covered deck overlooks the enormous backyard. There are also 3 sizeable bedrooms serviced by a sparkling new bathroom and laundry.
Positioned in an area where parkland abounds, with shops and schools nearby and a bus at the end of the street, and with additional features including ducted heating, split-system air-conditioning and hardwood timber floors, you'll just love coming home!
Tim Treeby

Description:
A Place Of Potential
Sited in a quiet, tree-lined street, this welcoming abode opens into an interior of warmth and comfort. The large entry foyer gives way to a spacious, smooth-flowing layout, further opened up by cathedral ceilings and floor-level windows that frame views of the leafy outdoors.
Generous living areas – which comprise a large lounge, formal dining, and relaxed kitchen and meals domain – are found to one side of the house, while 3 robed bedrooms (the master also with an ensuite) are serviced by the central bathroom and found on the other side.
External environs offer an abundance of space to enjoy the fresh air, showcasing a paved alfresco entertaining area overlooking a big, grassy backyard. An above-ground, outdoor spa is just another way to indulge in outside leisure, to the backdrop of undulating clouds and towering mountains.
As there are 2 electricity meters in the meter box, and the very rear of the property is connected for sewerage, water and electricity, a budding entrepreneur could see this as a great opportunity to set up private working quarters, or alternatively the potential for a dual occupancy site can be explored (all subject to council approval).
Located in easy reach of local schools, parks and shops, this lovely home is also just moments drive from the numerous conveniences of Eastland and EastLink.
Land size: approximately 874SQM
Features:
• Gas ducted heating
• Open fireplace in the lounge room
• Cathedral ceilings
• Floor-level windows
• Gas cooking
• New gas hot water
• 3 generous bedrooms – all with BIRs, master also with an ensuite
• Large backyard – with an alfresco entertaining area, big grassy garden and above-ground, outdoor spa
• The rear of the property is connected for sewerage, water and electricity (there are 2 electricity meters in the meter box)
• Ample off-street parking space

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
This immaculate brick home presents an array of opportunity to the astute home buyer, investor or developer that must be seen to appreciate the countless possibilities that lie ahead. Whether it is the stunning rear garden for young families to play in or the bungalow that provides the perfect solution to noisy teenagers, or simply the option to develop 871m2 of land with dual Occ potential(STCA).
With endless possibilities this home will immediately provide the family with a large recently painted living space complete with wall heating, cooling and hardwood polished floors throughout. An adjoining kitchen/meals area looks out into a light filled pergola ready for those warm summer nights outdoors.
Wake up in a generous master bedroom with garden views ,providing 2 other bedrooms, family bathroom with toilet, and separate laundry as the many other quality rooms within this home. A huge well maintained rear garden contains a work shed attached to a large insulated bungalow with lighting and hand basin that also provides potential use for ether home office/studio or teenage retreat. Backing onto parkland what a great location with close proximity to a number of local kindergartens schools, shops and the bus stop right at your door.
